answers.answer: Love to know to.Im feeling the same... even my tummy feels heavy or something very hard to explain.im 37weeks and have g.diabetes aswell only my doctors never seem to talk about anything about birth ect my next apt is a week away.

I will ask my doctor tomorrow and let you know. I think i ask too many questions to my doc and she is also very talkative. Thats the reason i get to know many extra things which probably most doctors would not even discuss. :D
Unfortunately those are not signs that labor is imminent.  But it is a sign that ur in your last month and sooner or later you will go into labour but you may or may not go til 41 weeks.

I'm having the same thing and my midwife told me it's completely normal and it's the uterus getting ready for birth but I know for certain they aren't contractions so I wasn't in any panic, I just never felt any of this with my first daughter so I was unsure of what it was
Oh joy so just another fun side effect of pregnacy!? Great! Sorry im really having a bad pregnancy and just want this over!

question: I went for Non stress test yesterday due ti diabetes. No contractions were noticed at all and my doctor said if she doesnt see any symptoms of me going into labour any time soon.But since yesterday evening i am experiencing cramping though not very strong that i would complain. But its there. Also my hips and legs have beeb paining an feeling heavy as if i would get my periods.Since i am ftm, not sure if this is a sign of labour. I have my appointment tomorrow morning but was hoping if any mommy had such experience or if this is normal at 37 weeks.
title: 37 weeks..light menstural cramps and heaviness.. is it an early sign of labour?
